summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'non-conformative', 'RosettaRemodel', 'per-structure', 'MOTIVATION:Recent' | Multi-Scale Structural Analysis of Proteins by Deep Semantic Segmentation | Semantic Segmentor for Protein Structures | A CNN for performing semantic segmantation of multi-domain protein structures | Written in Python. Main requirements are Biopython, Pytorch, Numpy, Scipy. (I use Conda since Pytorch recommends using it.)
summary.name: fp6bd
